participant_1.background:
I'm close with my parents, but they don't understand my music taste.
I like to cook for my family and friends because it allows me to relax and be creative.
i m a hopeless romantic.
I snuggle up with my cat and read Anne of Green Gables.
I'm not rich, but I'm content with my life and I love spending time with my dog.

participant_2.background:
I've had to say goodbye to my cat, who was my best friend.
I had to learn to adapt to a new way of life after my farm was foreclosed.
I enjoy a good debate with myself on my free time, perhaps over a glass of expensive wine.
I usually spend my free time helping people in need.
I spent the year creating a series of paintings inspired by my favorite childhood books.

content.text: Hey there! What do you like to do in your free time?
I like to paint! I spent all year creating a series of paintings inspired by my favorite childhood books.
Wow that sounds really cool! I like to cook and spend time with my dog and cat.
I used to have a cat, but he passed away last year. It was really hard to say goodbye.
I'm so sorry to hear that. I know how hard it is to lose a pet.
Thanks. It was a tough time, but I'm starting to feel better.
I have so many favorites, but I think Anne of Green Gables is my all-time favorite.
That's a great choice! I love that book too.
Me too! I like to snuggle up with my cat and read it when I'm feeling stressed or overwhelmed.
That sounds like a great way to relax.
It is. Do you have any other hobbies?
I like to help people in need. I think it's important to give back to the community.
That's awesome! I think that's a great way to spend your free time.
Thanks! I think it's important to make a difference in the world.
I agree. I think it's important to help others whenever we can.
